name: Waldo.io
description:
DISCLAIMER

ONLY THE WINDOWS BUILD SHOULD BE CONSIDERED A SUBMISSION

THE HTML BUILD USES COPYRIGHTED MATERIAL WE FELT FIT MUCH BETTER THAN ANYTHING WE HAD THE RIGHTS FOR. WE KNEW THIS SONG BEFORE IT WAS ON TIKTOK OK?

Song is Kero Kero Bonito - Flamingo

Created for GMTK Jam 2019

Compete against other humans in a wholesome search for the person named Waldo in a crowd named not named Waldo.

There are many Waldos, but only one at a time. Go head to head with 4 other players in a tense identify-a-thon!

You must be have an active internet connection in order to play Waldo.io

Created by the Big Breakfast Collective:

Mattia 'Pasta' Traverso @MattiaNotFound

Alex 'Frikandel' Williams @AngryLawnNinja

Dennis 'Sauerkraut' Lorenz @OtherDennis
